Description.Text:
The Marriott Grand Chateau, located next door to The Carriage House, has begun new construction on two towers. The contractors do begin work as early as 5:00am, Monday through Friday. In addition, some work may be done in the overnight hours from 11:00pm to 5:00am. Unfortunately, the noise and work hours are out of the control of The Carriage House. The work is anticipated to continue through 2014.

Discover The Carriage House, a non-gaming hotel, and relax in one of the spacious rooms and suites with full equipped kitchens or kitchenettes. Enjoy the heated outdoor pool and whirpool and fitness room. Rooms include complimentary wi-fi internet and in-room safes.
Centrally located just one block east of City Center on the Las Vegas Strip and tucked between the MGM and Planet Hollywood hotels.

DELUXE - GUEST_ROOM - Room has a king size bed & fully equipped kitchenette, including small refrigerator, microwave, two burner cook top, toaster, coffee maker and sink. Dishes, glassware & flatware also in room. All rooms have individual heat & A/C and includes i Home docking stations and flat screen TV. All rooms are non-smoking.
DELUXE - GUEST_ROOM - Room has two double beds & fully equipped kitchenette, including small refrigerator, microwave, two burner cook top, toaster, coffee maker and sink. Dishes, glassware & flatware also in room. All rooms have individual heat & A/C and includes i Home docking stations and flat screen TV. All rooms are non-smoking.
GUEST - SUITE - Room has a king or queen bed in the bedroom and one queen sofa bed in separate living room. Rooms also have a full kitchen or fully equipped kitchenette, including small refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker. All rooms have individual heat & A/C and includes i Home docking stations and flat screen TV. Non-smoking and smoking rooms are available.
